about_the_game:
Welcome to QubiQuest: Castle Craft, where chaos reigns and creativity knows no bounds. Dive into an epic siege sandbox where you can build massive castles in a fully destructible voxel world.

Prepare your economy and defend your fortress against relentless hordes of quirky enemies in magnificent battles that combine mayhem with physics-driven fun.

Castle Craft is the ultimate mashup of voxel sandbox shenanigans, action-packed gameplay, and horde defense madness.

In Castle Craft, you are the lord of your castle and can build your dream castle! Well. Sort of.

You serve as the beloved and esteemed King Debimius’ right hand. As he will kindly remind you, “You work, I get the credit.”

Relentless and regularly evolving hordes of enemies are going to fling themselves at your dream castle on a regular basis. But you get the luxury of a veritable smorgasbord of traps and mechanics that can be combined for maximum destruction!

As an incredibly loyal vassal, you don’t need to build every block individually. Nor do you need to mine the necessary resources yourself. Instead, count on the help of your thriving artisan economy right within your castle walls and surrounding fields to make resource collection an absolute breeze.

With a flourishing economy, automate the process of creating increasingly impressive structures. Then use the fruits of your villager’s labor to train a fearless band of defenders. Pair them strategically with your ingenious traps to create a fortress that is both fun and formidable.

Jump into the fray and wield unique magical abilities with the power to terraform the landscape. Alongside your insanely chaotic siege weaponry, you can turn the tide of battle and prove your mettle.

This becomes incredibly important as you must defend your castle against ever-evolving enemy units that come equipped with wilder and more challenging abilities and traits over time. Nobody said castle crafting would be easy.

Also did we mention that the entire environment is destructible? Everything can be altered by damage and magic.

Your work will be put to the test in Castle Craft. Consistently growing waves of enemies will probe your defenses and repeatedly lay siege to your castle. Join the battle yourself or focus on coordinating your forces.

Will you invest your resources into improved castle structures, a larger defending force, or your own character? Your choices determine the course of your campaign to expand and defend your kingdom. No pressure.

short_description: Will your castle survive the relentless onslaught, or collapse under pressure? Build, manage resources, and outsmart your foes in a world where everything can be destroyed. Use strategy and creativity to turn the chaos into your greatest advantage!
